bibl.title: Classical Architecture in Roman Egypt.

series.title: Oxford University Committee for Archaeology. Monographs.

bibl.title: Architecture and Architectural Sculpture in the Roman Empire
bibl.author: BAILEY, Donald M.

bibl.note: The purpose of this paper is to show that Egypt has much to offer in the way of Roman architecture. Only public buildings are discussed.
BAILEY Donald M., Classical Architecture in Roman Egypt.
Martin HENIG (Ed.), Architecture and Architectural Sculpture in the Roman Empire = Oxford University Committee for Archaeology. Monographs. 29 (Oxford, 1990) pp. 121-137, figg. 8.1-16.
